description:
Brent is just impossibly cute! He’s got a bright smile and a certain Southern politeness about him.
As I was getting to know him, I noticed that he kept calling me ‘sir.’
When I asked him about it, he said, “I was brought up to be respectful.”
I was thankful he didn’t add “of my elders!”
I also noticed that he was wearing a brand new pair of cowboy boots.
“I’m from the south,” he said. “We just always wear boots.”
“I see,” I said. “Were you raised on a ranch or a farm?”
“Of course!” he said with a big smile. “I knew how to work the tractor by the time I was twelve.”
Once his clothes came off he stopped being polite and started being a little nasty. He kept fingering his ass until he shot a big load.
I am guessing he is a bottom!
title: Brent
